body:

- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------
Execute this line at the PowerShell Core prompt (I tried this on Window 10 AU with PS Alpha 16):
```posh
Add-Type "public class Util { public static int GetVal(System.ConsoleColor color) { return (int)color; }}"
```
Expected behavior
-----------------
The type is added and is usable.

Actual behavior
---------------
I get two errors and the type is not added:
```
Add-Type : (1) : The type or namespace name 'ConsoleColor' does not exist in the namespace 'System' (are you missing
an assembly reference?)
(1) : >>> public class Util { public static int GetVal(System.ConsoleColor color) { return (int)color; }}
At line:1 char:1
+ Add-Type "public class Util { public static int GetVal(System.Console ...
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidData: (Microsoft.Power...peCompilerError:AddTypeCompilerError) [Add-Type], Except
   ion
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : SOURCE_CODE_ERROR,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.AddTypeCommand

Add-Type : Cannot add type. Compilation errors occurred.
At line:1 char:1
+ Add-Type "public class Util { public static int GetVal(System.Console ...
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidData: (:) [Add-Type], InvalidOperationException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : COMPILER_ERRORS,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.AddTypeCommand
```
`[System.ConsoleColor]` **is** available at the prompt so I'm not sure why `Add-Type` is choking.

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSEdition                      Core
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              3.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.16
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```
